subsection.name: Maven dependency
subsection.p: Prefered way is to get the code as Maven dependency into your project

subsection.name: Build from source
subsection.p: If you want to build it yourself, check out the source from svn:
To In the project root type
After the first run you can use the slightly faster command

subsection.name: Configuring the properties
subsection.p: The properties can be found in the runner.properties

subsection.name: Configuring the path to traverse
subsection.p: In the (absolute) path * and ** can be used. For example:
This will match /content/documents/[any path element]/2009/[everything below]

subsection.name: Using queries
subsection.p: Specify the query language, in this case "xpath"
This will match all document; within path "content/gallery which are of the type "hippogallery:imageset"

subsection.name: Example path usage
subsection.source:
# repository configuration repository.url=rmi://127.0.0.1:1099/hipporepository repository.user=admin repository.pass=admin
# everything that starts with /content/documents repository.path=/content/documents/**
# Java plugins plugins.java.logplugin.class=org.onehippo.forge.jcrrunner.plugins.LoggingPlugin

subsection.name: Example query usage
subsection.source:
# repository configuration repository.url=rmi://127.0.0.1:1099/hipporepository repository.user=admin repository.pass=admin
repository.query.language=xpath repository.query=content/gallery//element(*, hippogallery:imageset)
# Java plugins plugins.java.logplugin.class=org.onehippo.forge.jcrrunner.plugins.LoggingPlugin
